import React from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{useProducts}from"../context/ProductContext";import"../assets/css/productListStyles.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductList=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const{products}=useProducts();// Get products from context
const goToAddProduct=()=>{navigate("/products/add");};const goToEditProduct=product=>{navigate("/products/edit",{state:{product}});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Product Management"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:goToAddProduct,className:"btn",children:"Add New Product"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"products",children:products.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image,alt:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:product.price}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>goToEditProduct(product),children:"Edit"})]},product.id))})]});};export default ProductList;
